title: Did Nancy Pelosi Offer a Border Wall in Exchange for a Full Gun Ban?
subtitle: If true, this is our chance to see what happens when an unstoppable force meets an immovable object.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Returning Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi proposed to fund the building of President Trump's border wall in exchange for a bill banning the ownership of firearms by any U.S. citizen.
